articles.content:
Friendly gathering with members of Brazilian delegation 
    Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A friendly gathering with members of the delegation of parliamentarians from various political parties of Brazil led by senator Emilia Fernandes, member of the leadership of the Brazilian Workers' Party, was held at the Pyongyang embroidery institute yesterday.
 Present there were the vice-chairman of the Korea-Brazil Friendship Association and members of the association.    
 After looking round the institute, the participants saw a performance given by members of its art circle and talked to each other.

articles.title: Friendly gathering with Russian women
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from WFDY 
    Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A gift was presented to leader Kim Jong Il by the World Federation of Democratic Youth.
 It was handed to an official concerned by president of the WFDY Iraklis Tsavdaridis on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Educational aid fund and stipends to Chongryon
articles.content:
Friendly gathering with Russian women 
    Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A friendly gathering with members of the delegation of the Russian Women's Union led by co-president Galina Galkina was held here yesterday.
 Present there was Choe Chang Suk, vice-chairwoman of the central committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union.    
 Participants in the gathering conversed with each other about activities, achievements and experience of the women's unions in the two countries.

Educational aid fund and stipends to Chongryon 
    Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il sent educational aid fund and stipends amounting to 246.6 million yen (Japanese currency)in the 147th installment for the development of the democratic national education of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
 This brought the total amount of educational aid fund and stipends remitted by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the children of the Korean residents in Japan to 44,603,963,000 yen.

articles.content:
Greetings to Yemeni foreign minister 
    Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Abu Baker Abdullah al Garby upon his appointment as foreign minister of Yemen.
 The message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in mutual interests and wished him success in the performance of his new duty.
